title: Beachfront Bliss
description: Experience the ultimate coastal getaway in our stunning A-frame vacation rental with breathtaking ocean views, perfect for families or groups up to 6 guests.
indoor: Bright and airy coastal vacation rental space
outdoor: Relax by the inviting poolside oasis
amenities: Featuring modern amenities, including a private pool, outdoor kitchen, gym, hot tub, and family-friendly facilities like cribs and a children's playroom.
nearbyPlaces: Casual dining, thrilling attractions, and convenient shopping all within minutes of your stay.
